insert into debt_info (current_credit_code, id, debt_id, seller, status_id, lender, bid_date_time, owing_number, owing_principal, owing_interest, days, price_for_sale_rate, price_for_sale, preference_degree, listing_id, credit_code, listing_amount, listing_mouths, listing_time, listing_rate, past_due_number, allowance_radio, PastDueDay) values (#{currentCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{debtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owingNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{owingPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{owingInterest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceForSaleRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceForSale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{preferenceDegree,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{listingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{listingMouths,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{listingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{listingRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pastDueNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{allowanceRadio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pastdueday,jdbcType=INTEGER})
